channel.title: FRT on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in FRT on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Telangana High Court issues notice in India’s first legal challenge to the deployment of Facial Recognition Technology
item.description: Telangana High Court has issued notice in a petition by Mr. S.Q. Masood challenging the deployment of Facial Recognition Technology in Telangana. IFF provided legal support.

item.title: “The use of FRT does not require any anchoring legislation” - The Meghalaya Government
item.description: Mr. Lyngdoh, a law student, sent a legal notice to the Meghalaya Govt. seeking reconsideration of use of FRT for pensioners in view of the possible privacy concerns. The Meghalaya Govt. in its response has explained its position which we have analysed.
